mapper.sql: a.id, a.office_id AS "office.id", a.name, a.enname, a.role_type AS roleType, a.data_scope AS dataScope, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag, o.name AS "office.name", o.code, a.useable AS useable, a.from_sys AS fromSys
mapper.select: SELECT sr.id AS sr_id, sr.name AS sr_name,sr.code AS sr_code, sm.id AS sm_id,sm.name AS sm_name,sm.permission AS sm_permission FROM sys_user_sys_role susr LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON susr.sys_role_id=sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_sys_menu srsm ON srsm.sys_role_id=sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON sm.id=srsm.sys_menu_id WHERE susr.sys_user_id=#{userId}
